author: Josh Constine
title: Snapchat’s Zenly launches coronavirus Stay Home leaderboard
description: Snapchat’s location sharing app acquisition Zenly has gamified shelter-in-place during the COVID-19 outbreak. Today the app launched its Stay At Home challenge that shows a leaderboard of which friends have spent the most percentage of the last three days in …
